title: Remove a purchase from your won items list
description: Hides a listing from the won items list.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: purchaseId
path.description: The ID of the purchase to hide. Do not include a "P" prefix.

returns.description: <HideMyTradeMeResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful. Note that this operation will only report failure if the purchase still exists in the won items list after the operation completes. In all other cases, this API will report success (for example it will report success if the purchase ID is invalid or the purchase has already been removed).

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
